stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be used to replace  /* missing loop header */  so that the code segment prints  6?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

int count = 0; 
for (int x = 1; x <= 3; x++) 
{ 
   /* missing loop header */ 
   { 
      count++; 
   } 
} 
System.out.println(count);
